main event: A UFO was visually tracked by radar, initially distinct but disappeared from radar after 2 minutes. Visual observers failed to see the object.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes,The object was tracked by radar but not seen by visual observers,The object was reported to be likely an aircraft or missile,Observers described the object as having numerous bluish-gray lights on its underside,The observers were sitting in a convertible when they noticed the object.
sighted object: an ellipsoid-shaped object with bluish-gray lights
witness description: an observer and his wife, both experienced in aerial observation
